description: This sweet and soft bread is moist and smells just as good as it tastes.
name: Strawberry & Banana Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium banana (ripe and 3 mashed, 1 for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tin and cover it with parchment paper.
In a mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together. Crack the eggs in 1 by 1 and combine fully.
Sieve in the flour and baking powder while mixing. Mash 3 of the bananas with the strawberries and combine with the dough mixture.
Pour the mixture into the baking tray, garnish the top with the last sliced banana and bake for 50 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from the heat and allow to cool slightly before serving.
